title: Goldman paid CEO David Solomon $47mn in 2025 as its stock soared
description: Wall Street executive’s remuneration jumps 21% from the previous year and was roughly in line with bank’s profits
content: Wall Street executive’s remuneration jumps 21% from the previous year and was roughly in line with bank’s profits
